message: No one is going to take a jab at this?
I simply don't know the answer, sorry @ayaz :\
bound as opposed to escaped and interpolated directly into the SQL?
@ayaz You may find some info about it on chapter 20 of the Django book http://www.djangobook.com/en/2.0/chapter20/
@ayaz Django uses bound parameters for all queries in the built-in database backends.
